name: Snapper
tagline: Screen capturing & recording app for Android devices
body: # Snapper Screen capturing & recording app for Android devices based on my experiment on [Electron (Atom Shell)](http://electron.atom.io/) Snapper lets you take screenshots and record the screen of Android devices. e.g. ## Take screenshots ## Record screen ## Download * [Snapper-v0.0.1-mac.zip](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B55jSaVlW3gmd0dPOUZ2akNGOFE/view?usp=sharing) * [As of now, Windows and Linux prebuilts are not available yet but you can build them from source](https://github.com/atom/electron/blob/master/docs/tutorial/application-distribution.md) ## Requirements The target host (where the devices are connected) must still have ADB installed and either already running (e.g. via adb start-server) or available in $PATH. ## [License] (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prt2121/Snapper/master/LICENSE)
